attributes.action: keep the 10% tax band for low income people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People with low incomes who currently only pay 10% income tax will have have their tax bill doubled next April as proposed in the Budget.  Surely 100% increase in any tax is criminal, but for a Labour government to bring this in as well beggers belief!
A great proportion of these people will be state pensioners who will not be given any extra allowances to offset this additional tax until they are 75.  That's 10 years of extra tax.
